name: Charles Littleleaf
description: '''Charles Littleleaf''', a [[Native American flute|Native American flute player]] and flute maker, is a tribal citizen of the [[Warm Springs Indian Reservation]], [[Oregon]]. Charles is also an honorary member of the [[Piikani Nation]], [[Alberta]], Canada, and is the son of the late Chief Jack Littleleaf of [[Brocket, Alberta]].
